contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Vodka Martini, Macaroni Grill, Dunwoody GA.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Vodka martini]] A '''vodka martini''', also known as a '''vodkatini''' or '''kangaroo cocktail''',<ref>{{cite web|last=Heugel|first=Bobby|title=Bobby Heugel's Weekly Cocktail: The Kangaroo Cocktail|url=http://blogs.houstonpress.com/eating/2010/04/the_kangaroo_cocktail.php|accessdate=6 September 2012}}</ref> is a [[cocktail]] made with [[vodka]] and [[vermouth]], a variation of a [[martini (cocktail)|martini]]. A vodka martini is made by combining vodka, [[Dry (alcohol)|dry]] vermouth, and ice in a [[cocktail shaker]] or mixing glass. The ingredients are chilled, either by stirring or shaking, then strained and served "[[Straight up (bartending)|straight up]]" (without ice) in a chilled [[cocktail glass]]. The drink may be [[cocktail garnish|garnished]] with an [[olive]], a "twist" (a strip of [[lemon]] peel squeezed or twisted), [[caper]]s, or [[cocktail onion]]s (with the onion garnish specifically yielding a vodka [[Gibson (cocktail)|Gibson]]). [[James Bond]] famously drinks a "Vodka Martini, [[shaken not stirred]]."<ref name=Cocktails>{{cite book|title=Cocktails a Complete Guide to Bartending with Over 500 Cocktail Recipes|year=2007|publisher=MobileReference.com|location=Boston|isbn=1605011045|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=bdHlN7hkz6EC&pg=PT156&dq=vodka+martini+kangaroo&hl=en&sa=X&ei=XWXYUK2bC-TW2QXn94E4&ved=0CEYQ6AEwAw#v=onepage&q=vodka%20purists&f=false}}</ref> The vodka martini has become a common and popular cocktail, but some purists maintain that, while it is a perfectly fine drink, it isn't a martini, which they insist must be made with gin.<ref>[http://www.esquire.com/drinks/vodka-martini-drink-recipe#wondrich Wonderich, David, "Vodka Martini - The Wonderich Take", ''Esquire'']</ref><ref name=Cocktails/><ref>{{cite journal|last=Buffo|first=Peter|title=That martini mystique|journal=[[Orange Coast (magazine)|Orange Coast]] |year=2004 |month=May |page=174 |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=jwQEAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA174&dq=vodka+martini+purists&hl=en&sa=X&ei=j2vYUNWyFOLo2QXmmoG4Dw&ved=0CEAQ6AEwAQ#v=onepage&q=vodka%20martini%20purists&f=false}}</ref><ref>{{cite book|last=Bosker|first=Gideon|title=Atomic Cocktails: Mixed Drinks for Modern Times|year=1998|publisher=Chronicle Books|isbn=0811819264|page=90|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=cN7jGbbbsGEC&pg=PA90&dq=vodka+martini+purists&hl=en&sa=X&ei=j2vYUNWyFOLo2QXmmoG4Dw&ved=0CEQQ6AEwAg#v=onepage&q=vodka%20martini%20purists&f=false |coauthors=Karen Brooks and Damon Reed}}</ref><ref>{{cite book| last=Felten |first=Eric|title=How's Your Drink?: Cocktails, Culture, and the Art of Drinking Well|year=2007|publisher=Agate Publishing|isbn=1572840897|page=41|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=ANSXqicDb4IC&pg=PA41&dq=vodka+martini+purists&hl=en&sa=X&ei=j2vYUNWyFOLo2QXmmoG4Dw&ved=0CGIQ6AEwBw#v=onepage&q=vodka%20martini%20purists&f=false}}</ref><ref>{{cite book|last=Axelrod|first=Alan|title=The Pocket Idiot's Guide to Bartending |year=2002 |publisher=Penguin |isbn=1101221852 |page=57 |url=http://books.google.com/books?id=2HdSzpifnlEC&pg=PA57&dq=vodka+martini+purists&hl=en&sa=X&ei=j2vYUNWyFOLo2QXmmoG4Dw&ved=0CGgQ6AEwCA#v=onepage&q=vodka%20martini%20purists&f=false |authorlink=Alan Axelrod}}</ref> ==References== {{Commonscat|Vodka martini}} {{Reflist}} {{IBACocktails}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vodka Martini}} [[Category:Cocktails with vodka]] {{Mixed-drink-stub}}
